name: European Athletic Association (European Athletics)
goal:
European Athletics is the govening body for the sport of athletics (track & field, road running, race walking, cross country running and mountain running) in Europe. It operates within the framework of the world governing body, the International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF).

Our role is the develop, promote and foster the sport, in both its competitive and non-competitive forms, on behalf of and in cooperation with our 51 Member Federations.

Our mission is to bring athletics to every home and every phone in Europe. We do this by:

1) Promoting fair play and other ethical values in sport, including the fight against doping;

2) Staging a programme of European Athletics championships;

3) Marketing the sport at the international level;

4) Supporting our Member Federations in their work by coordinating activities and cooperation, offering tools, delivering programmes and managing external relations.
euInitiatives: European Athletic follows and participates in the Erasmus+ programme and the European Week of Sport.
